Name: The Hero with a Thousand Arms / 千手英雄
About the game: This is a game that challenge you to play many mini games in one screen at the same time. Sounds impossible to beat them all ? Don't worry, when you focus in one game, the others with be in slow mode. you can get stars in each games and you can use these stars to restart the lost game. Easy now ? we guarantee it's still very challenging. And the best of all, you can design your own challenge level in editor and play! Also you can send level code to your friend. 6 mini games included : Well Diver Gun Hat Cyber Puck Jump Man Candy Box Star Num Genre include : Shooter Platformer Puzzle Sport Arcade ( More games and genre are coming soon )
